original_text: if you know his will and approve of what is superior because you are instructed by the law;
korean_text: 율법의 교훈을 받아 하나님의 뜻을 알고 지극히 선한 것을 분간하며

sentences.original_text: and approve of what is superior
because you are instructed by the law
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 당신은 율법으로 가르침을 받았기 때문입니다
